mapper.select: SELECT th.HAIR_NUMBER , HAIR_NAME, HAIR_CONTENT , tl.LENGTH_NAME, HAIR_GENDER, th.SHAPE_NUMBER, tfs.SHAPE_NAME FROM TBL_HAIR th JOIN TBL_LENGTH tl ON th.LENGTH_NUMBER = tl.LENGTH_NUMBER JOIN TBL_FACE_SHAPE tfs ON th.SHAPE_NUMBER = tfs.SHAPE_NUMBER WHERE th.HAIR_NUMBER = #{hairNumber}
SELECT HAIR_NAME FROM TBL_HAIR th WHERE LENGTH_NUMBER = #{lengthNumber} AND SHAPE_NUMBER = #{shapeNumber} AND HAIR_GENDER = #{hairGender}
SELECT HAIR_NAME FROM TBL_HAIR WHERE HAIR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{hairName}||'%'
